11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_REVERB_MODEL_ESTIMATOR_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_REVERB_MODEL_ESTIMATOR_H_
13
14#include <array>
15#if defined(WEBRTC_WEBKIT_BUILD)
16#include <memory>
17#endif
18#include <vector>
19
20#include "absl/types/optional.h"
21#include "api/array_view.h"
22#include "api/audio/echo_canceller3_config.h"
23#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/aec3_common.h" // kFftLengthBy2Plus1
24#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/reverb_decay_estimator.h"
25#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/reverb_frequency_response.h"
26
27namespace webrtc {
28
29class ApmDataDumper;
30
31// Class for estimating the model parameters for the reverberant echo.
32class ReverbModelEstimator {
33 public:
34 ReverbModelEstimator(const EchoCanceller3Config& config,
35 size_t num_capture_channels);
36 ~ReverbModelEstimator();
37
38 // Updates the estimates based on new data.
39 void Update(
40 rtc::ArrayView<const std::vector<float>> impulse_responses,
41 rtc::ArrayView<const std::vector<std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>>>
42 frequency_responses,
43 rtc::ArrayView<const absl::optional<float>> linear_filter_qualities,
44 rtc::ArrayView<const int> filter_delays_blocks,
45 const std::vector<bool>& usable_linear_estimates,
46 bool stationary_block);
47
48 // Returns the exponential decay of the reverberant echo.
49 // TODO(peah): Correct to properly support multiple channels.
50 float ReverbDecay() const { return reverb_decay_estimators_[0]->Decay(); }
51
52 // Return the frequency response of the reverberant echo.
53 // TODO(peah): Correct to properly support multiple channels.
54 rtc::ArrayView<const float> GetReverbFrequencyResponse() const {
55 return reverb_frequency_responses_[0].FrequencyResponse();
56 }
57
58 // Dumps debug data.
59 void Dump(ApmDataDumper* data_dumper) const {
60 reverb_decay_estimators_[0]->Dump(data_dumper);
61 }
62
63 private:
64 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<ReverbDecayEstimator>> reverb_decay_estimators_;
65 std::vector<ReverbFrequencyResponse> reverb_frequency_responses_;
66};
67
68} // namespace webrtc
69
70#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_REVERB_MODEL_ESTIMATOR_H_
71
